<!-- source-hash: 420ab7e4d120a309a4cf40562c860bc2 -->
A data transfer object representing organization filter options for audit operations, containing organization ID and display name for filtering and presentation purposes.

## Key Components

- **OrganizationFilterResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for auto-generated methods
- **id** - String field for organization identifier used in filtering operations
- **name** - String field for human-readable organization name for display

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating an organization filter response
OrganizationFilterResponse orgFilter = OrganizationFilterResponse.builder()
    .id("org-123")
    .name("Acme Corporation")
    .build();

// Using in a filter list
List<OrganizationFilterResponse> organizationFilters = Arrays.asList(
    OrganizationFilterResponse.builder()
        .id("org-123")
        .name("Acme Corporation")
        .build(),
    OrganizationFilterResponse.builder()
        .id("org-456")
        .name("Tech Solutions Inc")
        .build()
);

// Accessing properties
String orgId = orgFilter.getId();          // "org-123"
String orgName = orgFilter.getName();      // "Acme Corporation"
```

The class uses Swagger annotations for API documentation and Lombok annotations to automatically generate constructors, getters, setters, and builder patterns, making it ideal for REST API responses containing organization filter options.
